passwordSecurity.title: Strong Passwords
passwordSecurity.description: Create complex passwords with at least 12 characters including uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and symbols.
tips: Do: Use a mix of characters and make it unique
Don't: Use personal information or common words

passwordSecurity.title: Password Manager
passwordSecurity.description: Use a password manager to generate, store, and manage unique passwords for all your accounts.
tips: Benefits: One master password, unique passwords everywhere

passwordSecurity.title: Regular Updates
passwordSecurity.description: Change passwords regularly, especially after security incidents or data breaches.
tips: Frequency: Every 3-6 months for critical accounts
Immediate: Change if account is compromised

twoFactorAuth.title: Authenticator Apps
twoFactorAuth.description: Use authenticator apps like Google Authenticator or Microsoft Authenticator for secure 2FA.
tips: Advantages: Works offline, more secure than SMS
Setup: Scan QR code, enter 6-digit code
Backup: Save recovery codes in safe place

twoFactorAuth.title: SMS 2FA
twoFactorAuth.description: SMS-based 2FA provides an additional layer of security through text messages.
tips: Good for: Basic security when app not available

twoFactorAuth.title: Hardware Keys
twoFactorAuth.description: Physical security keys like YubiKey provide the highest level of 2FA security.
tips: Best for: High-value accounts and businesses

softwareUpdates.title: Operating System
softwareUpdates.description: Keep your operating system updated with the latest security patches and updates.

softwareUpdates.title: Web Browsers
softwareUpdates.description: Update browsers regularly to protect against web-based attacks and vulnerabilities.

softwareUpdates.title: Mobile Apps
softwareUpdates.description: Keep mobile apps updated to ensure you have the latest security features and bug fixes.

networkSecurity.title: VPN Usage
networkSecurity.description: Use a Virtual Private Network (VPN) when connecting to public Wi-Fi or untrusted networks.
tips: When to use: Public Wi-Fi, hotels, airports

networkSecurity.title: Home Network
networkSecurity.description: Secure your home Wi-Fi network with strong passwords and encryption.
tips: Password: Use WPA3 encryption if available
Guest: Enable guest network for visitors

networkSecurity.title: Firewall
networkSecurity.description: Enable firewall protection on your devices to block unauthorized network access.

emailSecurity.title: Phishing Awareness
emailSecurity.description: Learn to identify and avoid phishing emails that try to steal your information.
tips: Red flags: Urgent language, suspicious links
Never: Click links in suspicious emails

emailSecurity.title: Attachments
emailSecurity.description: Be cautious with email attachments, especially from unknown senders.
tips: Scan: Use antivirus to scan attachments

emailSecurity.title: Email Filtering
emailSecurity.description: Use email filtering and spam protection to reduce malicious emails.
tips: Custom: Create rules for specific senders
